alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 2:50PM AKST until January 01 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches in Yakutat this evening. * WHERE...The Northeast Gulf Coast including Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In Yakutat, snow showers will persist into this evening before tapering off.
info.instruction: A warning means that a winter storm is already occurring or imminent. This storm could pose a threat to life and property. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
